page.title: 11GOREY YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Gorey Youth-club looks to be quite a big place on the outside, but inside it is quite small. As you walk into the club there is a hall, not very large, and only about 7 feet high. It is L-shaped, and there is a small canteen. Upstairs there is a snooker table, a pool table, table-tennis and darts. It is planned to build a disco area in a space that is not used. The club may not be big, but there are also outdoor activities. Some nights we go canoeing or absailing, or for a swim-barbeque at St. Ouen, and once a year, generally in the Easter holidays, we camp for a weekend at St. Aubin's Fort. There are about 20 in the senior club, aged 13-18, with two leaders, and the same number in the junior club, aged 7-12, with three leaders.
